name: trailer tour_des_ilhas
description: Trailer of the installation and performance for the collective action Coordenadas Confinadas from May 14 to 16, 2021. A research in art and technology that crosses the devices with tangible interfaces towards the bodily perception of the interactor/performer that promotes the overlap of the virtual world with the current one. More information: http://coordenadasconfinadas.art.br/tour-des-ilhas-darley-cardoso/ By Darley Cardoso | www.darley.art.br | @darleycardoso
